data.meanings: (Kaf-Alif-Nun) To be, exist, happen, occur, take place, become, be such or so.
data.sentence: The word مَكَانٍ comes from the root ك و ن and is associated with the meanings: (Kaf-Alif-Nun) To be, exist, happen, occur, take place, become, be such or so.
The word التَّنَاوُشُ comes from the root ن و ش and is associated with the meanings: to take, receive, seize, attain.
